reviews.title: Works well %26 smells good!
reviews.review_text: I can always count on Clorox products to work well; the Ocean Mist Gel really does cling %26 clean, and smells good too😃 Some peeps, with Arthritis in their hands, might have a little problem with twisting/opening the top the first time, but it gets easier on subsequent uses.
I like this because it sticks to the bowl and I have a better chance of getting everything clean. It smells good also which is a plus in the bathroom.

reviews.title: Clings, cleans, and smells great!
reviews.review_text: This toilet bowl cleaner with bleach actually smell good, the gel clings to the porcelain so that the cleaning brush pad can clean completely and the gel does not leave a color stain

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: I like the way it clings to the bowl, the ease of use, and the fresh sent it leaves especially after i'm done cleaning toilet. It leaves the bathroom feeling really clean and disinfected.

reviews.title: Quick and easy and reliable
reviews.review_text: Easy to squeeze where it is needed. Does actually cling as it drips down the inside of the toilet bowl to cover more of the side. I let it sit for a while to deodorize. No heavy scrubbing is needed to remove stains, as long as toilet is kept clean weekly.

reviews.title: Amazing Toilet Cleaner!
reviews.review_text: Clorox Toilet Bowl Cleaner is amazing for sanitizing the toilets in our house. It has an easy open Cap! It is easy to Squit around the toilet and does not make a mess, and all you need is a small squit to clean the toilet! Does not have a strong smell like alot of toilet cleaners do. This us a must have in our house!!

The product is fine but I can't understand why Walmart cannot deliver items without damaging said items. whether it be shipment that originated from a store or home delivery or shipment via FedEx home, it is amazing how there is such little regard to how items are packed or shipped or transported by an individual from a store. An item should be delivered in the exact same condition in which I would find it upon a retail shelf.

The driver delivered to the wrong address and I tried to call but supposed to wait 48 hrs so I got cane and went and got my groceries and that resident thought I was taking groceries left for him. I managed to get them up my wheelchair ramp. Very disappointed

reviews.title: BAD
reviews.review_text: I was watching for this delivery because I track them. Upon seeing it was 'arriving' I noticed the driver "Gustov" start carrying MY products to the bldg next door I had to go outside AND tell him the address he was going to was wrong. These were MY items that I PAID for. Glad I was watching. I was very upset %26 I wonder if this will happen again. Hesitant to place an order.

How am I supposed to rate something I NEVER received because it was cancelled BY WALMART? The fact that a survey is sent about it just adds insult to injury if not getting the item I ordered. And I'm still waiting for payment to be credited. The order was cancelled a few days after it was supposed to be received. Not good.

reviews.title: AMAZING!
reviews.review_text: When we moved into our current house the toilet had terrible hard water rings and stains that even industrial toilet cleaners didn't budge. This brand was recommended by Good Housekeeping so I gave it a try. Now every time I use the bathroom I take a moment to admire my clean, unblemished toilet bowl!!

reviews.title: The excellence of Clorox cleaning Toilet bowl
reviews.review_text: Clorox toilet bowl cleaner clinging beach gel does great things for the overall cleanliness and hygiene, environmental health of my home. I surely use it after most uses, or at least every two days or so. I'm hoping to help others afford or know what to buy through your programs with Walmart. Keep up the great work .

reviews.title: Sketchy
reviews.review_text: I would give you a no star if possible. I ordered two bottles of Clorox toilet bowl cleaner from Walmart app. I received two bottles of leaky Clorox toilet bowl cleaner thrown in a box with no packaging protection and no receipt from some random hotel supplier.

reviews.title: Mr.
reviews.review_text: I can't figure out how to get a list of my shipment. I can't figure out how to notify you what you charged me for and didn't deliver. On my last delivery 3 olive orders were missing. I find your system very difficult to maneuver in. I often miss shipment times because I don't follow the instructions.

This Clorox toilet cleaning gel is the best ! I have used this for years and recently bought another brand and learned cheaper price means cheaper product I could have used water and got the same results This gel clings and leaves the bathroom smelling great !

Just squirt this cleaner around top edge of toilet bowl and watch it run down and cover the entire bowl. Now shut the top and go about your business. When you return later and flush, the toilet bowl is sparkling clean! I will never go back to scrubbing and keeping that nasty brush!

reviews.title: Works better and easier
reviews.review_text: I have never seen anything that works better or easier than this. The trick is to apply a thin layer slowly with total coverage and let it sit several minutes before gently scrubbing. It works great and leaves the bowl sparkling clean. If ring stains are old and set it may take a second direct application and a little more scrubbing. It also works well on sink and tub residue.

reviews.title: Still Like The Contents, New Nozzle SUX
reviews.review_text: I have removed one star because they folks at Clorox decided to "improve" something that was working fine, and now it doesn't work well at all. The old nozzle always had a small round opening through which the product dispensed. The harder you squeezed the bottle, the farther the product launched so it was easy to get it up under the rim during the application. The new nozzle has a longer, slit-style opening for "wider application". In theory, this sounds like it could be a good idea. The reality is that this opening is simply too large to get the product to project from the bottle- regardless how hard I squeeze. It just globs out and falls straight down. Didn't anyone test this idea prior to putting it into production?? I ended up having to manually spread the cleaning gel around inside the bowl with my brush. This means having to clean the brush after each application, apply to the next toilet, wash the brush, apply to the next toilet... After they all have cleaner in them, then I go back where I started and scrub each of the bowls and rinsing the brush AGAIN before moving on to the next. When this is gone, I will not buy again unless I find it is bottled with the old cap. It's a shame too because I actually prefer the product inside over the competition's.

I seem to have trouble after I start using this product. It seems like my surface thereafter has to be cleaned constantly to keep red mildew from growing. Its happened in three houses. It does clean the surface but I have to stop buying it and find something better.

reviews.title: Great Selection and Value!
reviews.review_text: I am 86 years old, live with my sweet cat and have no vehicle to drive. It is so easy with Walmarts well thought out web site to order online. You have great choices, products and prices. Clorox is an excellent product that I have used for years. Sue Fletcher

reviews.title: Did what it was supposed to!!
reviews.review_text: It did the trick! Blue ring stain caused by the blue dye in another Chlorox product came out beautifully using this Clorox Gel toilet cleaner. Nothing would take the porcelain stained ring out even using a plumbers stone. Very happy with this product and it will now be my go to toilet cleaner from now on.

Clorox gets the job done when cleaning the toilet. Sure, it's not the most glamorous chore, but using this product makes it quick, painless and leaves my bathroom smelling nice and fresh. The two pack is a great bang-for-your-buck. Whenever we run out I'll be purchasing again.

reviews.title: Squeaky Clean
reviews.review_text: I always choose Clorox toilet cleaner because I use Clorox, or bleach in general, for cleaning around the bowl as the toilet cleaner soaks a bit inside before I scrub it out. You never want to mix bleach with Lysol, as this creates harmful fumes. Bleach is always my go-to.

This product is always under our cabinet for quick use or deep cleaning. The liquid sprays in a directed location and adheres temporarily to the toilet bowl surfaces and runs down giving a great coverage are. With a swish or two ut leaves the bowl clean and fresh again.

reviews.title: Works but odor is very strong.
reviews.review_text: It works very well but for me the overpowering smell of the Clorox is almost too much. It worked well enough to remove a patch in my toilet i couldn't scrub away until applying this product so I will continue to use it but will keep the bathroom vent on and door closed for a little while afterwards.

I made a mistake. I bought the store brand and usually the store brand is as good as any other brand. You guys have good store brand but I'm not on the toilet bowl cleaner. Gotta go with Clorox stick you know clean and clean it. You can smell the clean air if you're done and quarks are using 50 years always done a good job for me. Thank you Curtis
